GEN.TITLE: LimboESP
GEN.APP_DEV_DESC: Deliver the latest version of this app to the device.
GEN.KEY_APP_DESC: By giving your app a key it will be served on an its own PUBLIC URL (/update/app/KEY). Use for (anonymous) production devices following one app update track without device management and the need to be approved and authorized.
GEN.NAME: Name
GEN.NAME_DEV_DESC: Give your device a unique name if you cannot remember MACs or UUIDs.
GEN.NAME_APP_DESC: Give your app a unique name.
GEN.SECRET_DEV_DESC: Authentication: Secret in device request must match, if defined.
GEN.STATE_DEV_DESC: Devices are registered as NEW with the first incoming request containing a new uuid. APPROVE to assign an app or BLOCK if you dont know the device and smell spam.
GEN.WELCOME: LimboESP - Your ESP OTA Firmware Update Manager

DETAIL.VAL_VERSION_BIN_DUPE: Same binary already bound to version {{no}} - {{name}}.
DETAIL.VAL_DEVICE_APP_UNAPPROVED: App can only be assigned to approved devices.
